snippet: Hudson at Haymount House, in Briarcliff Manor, is a contemporary restaurant in a Southern-style mansion built in 1910, its menu drawing on ingredients sourced from nearby farms.
abstract: Emily Denitto reviews Hudson at Haymount House, contemporary restaurant in Briarcliff Manor, NY (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: Hudson at Haymount House, in Briarcliff Manor, is a contemporary restaurant in a Southern-style mansion built in 1910, its menu drawing on ingredients sourced from nearby farms.
